---
title: "AsscCheck"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```



```{r cars}
STEAM <- read.csv("steam-200k.csv",header = FALSE)
head(STEAM)
colnames(STEAM)[1]<-"ID"
colnames(STEAM)[2]<-"Game"

write.csv(STEAM,"steamplayed.csv", row.names = FALSE)
library(arules)
G2 <- read.transactions("steamplayed.csv", format = "single", sep = ",", cols = 1:2)
inspect( head(G2,3) )
itemFrequency(G2)[ grep(c("Fallout 4"),itemLabels(G2)) ]


```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
